Installation¶

Python Versions¶

cliff is being developed under Python 2.7

Basic Installation¶

Wishbone should be installed into the same site-packages area where the application and extensions are installed (either a virtualenv or the global site-packages). You may need administrative privileges to do that.

Make sure you have the latest gevent build installed by downloading and installing gevent from https://bitbucket.org/denis/gevent/wiki/Home:

$ hg clone https://bitbucket.org/denis/gevent

Source Code¶

The source is hosted on github: https://github.com/smetj/wishbone

Reporting Bugs¶

Please report bugs through the github project: https://github.com/smetj/wishbone/issues
